name: Bounce Ball Arena
description:
Instructions: 

Single player: control the blue ball with the arrow keys, and try to bounce it against the purple ball as many times as you can. But make sure the the purple ball doesn't touch the right or left side of the arena!

Multiplayer: The blue ball controls with the WASD keys, while the purple uses the arrow keys. Try to bounce your opponent into the right or left walls to gain a point. Who ever gets ten points wins!

I made this with Unity, and did the music in pico-8, not much else to say. Enjoy! :)
